data.text:
CityClass Hotel SAVOY

Haan

Just 18 km from Düsseldorf and 40 km from Cologne, this 4-star hotel in Haan offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, a spa with swimming pool, and free underground parking. The CityClass Hotel Savoy has a wellness area with modern sauna and solarium... view morefrom

€ 55Home Hotel Haan Nichtraucher Hotel

Haan

This 3-star hotel offers spacious rooms, a swimming pool and a sauna. It lies right next to the Haan-Ost industrial estate, 2 kilometres from Haan town centre and free WiFi is provided... view morefrom

€ 43Hotel Hölscher

Solingen

This hotel and restaurant is located in the centre of Solingen-Wald, just a few walking minutes to the municipal park of Wald. Solingen train station is around 3 km away and there is a bus stop right outside the door... view morefrom

€ 68Kempe Komfort plus Hotel

Solingen

This hotel offers apartments with a kitchenette, Wi-Fi and free underground parking. It is a 10-minute walk from Solingen Station and a 15-minute drive from central Solingen... view morefrom

€ 68Bonifatia Erkrath

Erkrath

Non-smoking rooms and a garden patio are offered at this family-run guest house, quietly located in Erkrath, 18 km from central Düsseldorf. The rooms are simply decorated and some include a balcony. Rooms at Bonifatia Erkrath are carpeted... view morefrom
